description: Attack on Executive Magistrate of Feni Md Abdul Qader Mia by assailants of BNP and Jamaat-Shibir.Abdu Qader sustained injuries when the assailants hurled a crude bomb at a microbus carrying him near the police quarters on Shaheed Shahidullah Qaiser Road in Feni town around 9:05 pm on Friday. Qader Mia was rushed to the hospital for treatment
title: Attack on Executive Magistrate of Feni Md Abdul...
